basics.name: John Corser
basics.label: Software Development Engineer III
basics.summary: Senior SDE (L6) at AWS building AI-powered DevOps tools. 6+ years at Amazon developing cloud services, builder tools, and leading engineering initiatives.

work.summary: Building AWS DevOps Agent, an AI oncall and DevOps agentic product launched at Re:Invent 2025. Automatic response to tickets/alarms, investigating compute resource health and logs, and 3rd party MCP to identify root cause and mitigation strategy. Reference (SDM): dubashia@amazon.com

Developed AWS Amplify service including open-source CLI tools and closed-source CI/CD products for full-stack mobile and web applications on AWS. Launched at Re:Invent 2023. Reference (SDM): mujuluru@amazon.com
Built Amazon Seller Central builder tools and UI component libraries. Developed internal tooling and design systems for seller-facing applications. Reference (SDM): asardone@amazon.com
Led engineering team focused on backend APIs and cloud services for intelligent email clients (web/ios/android). Grew platform from pre-release to 200,000+ users. Reference (CTO): iankberry@gmail.com
College Startup. Developed data analysis algorithms for housing search engine. Acquired by ApartmentList in 2018.
